analyzed: gnas la bdag @217b kyang rten byed blo ni 'gro bar shin tu rings par gyur //

analyzed: de bzhin du bdag ster ba'i bdag po yang khyod nyid do //

analyzed: nor ldan ri phug khyod nyid ni //

analyzed: nags kyi lha rnams kyis ni lta // rgyas pa'i bu rnams bsdus nas gang gis zlos gar rab sbyar la //

analyzed: yang dag skyes sam sa chen yun ring gnas pas bden par smras //

analyzed: // / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rab tu zhugs so //

analyzed: gtsug na nor bu'i snyan pa'i grags pa chen pos phyogs rnams thams cad rab tu mdzes par brgya na //

translated: Like an ornament for the ears, with clothes, equal, with a smile all around,🔽Like anointed with a collection of sandalwood, filled with nectar, and bright with the light of the moon,

analyzed: / do shal rnam par 'phyang ba 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs kyis khyab cing rnam par g-yo ba ltar //

analyzed: ri bo'i rtsel grub pa rig 'dzin rnams ni bstod cing sgrogs //

analyzed: de phyir 'di ni gzhan gyi lag tu 'gro bar mi bya'i phyir //

analyzed: de yi rnam par spangs pa'i grong khyer s'a ke ta ni mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa rnams //

translated: The Vidyadhara said, Laugh and tell me this: Will he fall on the peak of Malaya, which is radiant with the ocean's waves,🔽or on the delightful and wondrous terraces of Mount Meru,🔽or on the mountain of the wish-fulfilling tree,

analyzed: gang zhig sgeg cing gsal la grub pa rnams ni rab dga' ri bo gangs ldan rtse mo'am //

analyzed: sa gzhi thams cad bris pa bzhin du nam mkha'i mthil nas lta zhing 'gro bar byed dam ci //🔽rig 'dzin ma nas /

analyzed: zhes nas yongs su zhugs so // ri phug 'di ni chu bo dal gyis 'bab pa yi //

analyzed: 'di ni nges par phyag bya ba'i gnas so zhes gnyis pos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'dzin pas nges par brtags nas /
translated: The vidyadharis looked around and said, This is definitely a place to pay homage. Two of them prostrated, and the vidyadhara examined it and said,

analyzed: 'dir ni de ba d'a ta ljon pa'i @218b bsil grib 'og //
translated: Here, under the cool shade of the devadaru tree,

original: nor bu mu tig rdo ba dag gi steng na ni //
analyzed: nor bu mu tig rdo ba dag gi steng na ni //
translated: on the surface of the jewels, pearls, and stones,

original: padma'i stan can mngon sum bzhin du skyil krung mdzad //
analyzed: padma'i stan can mngon sum bzhin du skyil krung mdzad //

analyzed: gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu nye bar zhugs par gyur //

original: rig 'dzin ma nas /
analyzed: rig 'dzin ma nas /

analyzed: aa ho de ni shin tu brtan pa zab pa brling ba'i mdzad pa can no //

analyzed: 'dis gangs ri thams cad dpal gyis gang bar byas so //

analyzed: rje'i sras 'dir me tog 'di rnams gang nas byung /

analyzed: rig pa 'dzin pas steng du bltas pa na ya mtshan che ste /

original: mkha' las lha rnams me tog char 'bebs shing //
analyzed: mkha' las lha rnams me tog char 'bebs shing //
translated: “In the sky, gods are raining down flowers

analyzed: sems can chen po mngon par mchod par byed //

original: de ni de bzhin mchod pa'i don du ni //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin mchod pa'i don du ni //

analyzed: bdag cag kyang ni me tog tshol du 'deng // zhes nas so //
translated: we too are sent to gather flowers.”

analyzed: de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dres pa ji lta ba mthong ste spyan cung zad phye nas aa ho nad med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, as they entered, they saw the deception just as it was. Opening his eyes slightly, he said, “Ah! The four concentrations of health are like this:

analyzed: rnam par rtog bcas rnam par dpyod dang g-yo ba'i rlabs //
translated: The first is with discursive thought, investigation, and moving waves.

original: dang po yin te dga' bde g-yo bcas gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dang po yin te dga' bde g-yo bcas gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second is with joy and bliss, but moving;

original: bde ba la chags 'jig pa'i nad can gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba la chags 'jig pa'i nad can gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is with attachment to bliss, and the sickness of destruction.

analyzed: rab tu zhi ba ro gcig mthar thug 'di ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth is with one taste of peace, and is ultimate.

original: bzhad gad pa nas /
analyzed: bzhad gad pa nas /
translated: The jester said:

analyzed: kye na mnyam khyod rang gcig pu de bzhin du dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob nas bdag gcig bu 'gengs shing thum por bsdams nas tshong pa bzhin du rnyed pa thob nas gnas par byed dam /
translated: “Oh, you are alone, and so you attain the bliss of the first, second, third, and fourth concentrations, and you fill yourself with bliss, and you are bound in a ball, and you stay like a merchant who has attained his profit.

original: bdag bram ze la yang bsam gtan cig kyang ma byin zhes zer /

analyzed: padma can dang / rin chen phreng ba ma dag kyang h'a bu h'a gzhon nu /
translated: Padmāvatī and Ratna-mālā said, Hāhā! Young prince,

original: h'a bu chung khyod kyis kyang bdag cag yongs su 'dor ram /
analyzed: h'a bu chung khyod kyis kyang bdag cag yongs su 'dor ram /
translated: Hāhā! Little prince, do you also abandon us?🔽 🔽Mother, he said, I am going to the forest to practice austerities.🔽 I will not abandon you.🔽 He said to his father, Father, I am going to the forest to practice austerities.🔽 I will not abandon you.
